00074 #ifndef __STDUMMYNODE_H
00075 #define __STDUMMYNODE_H

00078 #include <arboretum/stTypes.h>
00079 #include <arboretum/stException.h>

00090 // +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00091 // | Occupation | Next | Offset0 | ... | OffsetN |... | ObjectN | ... | Object 0 |
00092 // +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00093 class stDummyNode{
00094    public:
00106       stDummyNode(stPage * page, bool create = false);
00107 
00113       stPage * GetPage(){
00114          return Page;
00115       }//end GetPage
00116 
00122       stPageID GetPageID(){
00123          return Page->GetPageID();
00124       }//end GetPage
00125 
00134       stCount GetNumberOfEntries(){
00135          return this->Header->Occupation;
00136       }//end GetNumberOfEntries
00137 
00146       int AddEntry(stSize size, const stByte * object);
00147 
00158       const stByte * GetObject(int idx);
00159 
00170       stSize GetObjectSize(int idx);
00171 
00181       void RemoveEntry(stCount idx);
00182 
00186       stPageID GetNextNode(){
00187 
00188          return this->Header->Next;
00189       }//end GetNextNode
00190 
00196       void SetNextNode(stPageID idx){
00197          this->Header->Next = idx;
00198       }//end SetNextNode
00199 
00200    private:
00201 
00205       typedef struct DummyHeader{
00209          stSize Occupation;
00210 
00214          stPageID Next;
00215       }stDummyHeader;//end
00216 
00220       stPage * Page;
00221 
00225       stDummyHeader * Header;
00226 
00230       stSize * Entries;
00231 
00235       stSize GetFree();
00236       
00237 };//end stDummyNode
00238
